title: Beer Tasting Tool Kit (2012) (Pdf and Mobi) Gooner
description:
Beer Tasting Tool Kit - How to Choose and Taste Beer Like a Brewer (2012) (Pdf & Mobi) Gooner

Publisher: Chronicle Books; Box Bklt/C edition (February 8, 2012)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1452101760
ISBN-13: 978-1452101767

Here's a fun way to discover the nuances of artisan beers from lagers and ales to porters and stouts. Tasting profiles from the booklet get the ball rollingâ€”they break down beer into style categories and include information on each variety's background, flavors, aromas, and unique character. Cover the bottles with the paper sleeves to conduct blind tastings, and record tasting notesâ€”a world of beer awaits!
